5D6A30B1.Line1.F53E7: The potion is ready. To be thorough, we should test it on both cultists and non-cultists.

915323B5.Line5.F53E7: Return to me with the results.

F75EAA33.Line3.F53E7: There are many bandits in this area. Find some, add it to their food, and observe the results. Repeat the experiment with the cultists south of here.
